name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Markings removed via approved method (jet blast/Black grit). No visible ghosting.
METHOD: Jet blast or black grit spray minimum 20% wider than existing lines.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP, Photographic record
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD: Visual and manual check
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Surface clean, dry, and dust free before application
METHOD: Manual brooming, air blowing, and drying where needed.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Supervisor sign off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Set out conforms to drawings.Symbols in correct orientation and location.
METHOD: Measure up, mark with paint/chalk, verify spacings as per plan.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP, Photographic record
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD: Visual inspectioon, dry film thickness check, reflectivity.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Thickness per spec (≤2.0mm for thermoplastic), reflectivity to AS 1742.
METHOD: Apply materials as per spec, black grit as required.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Thickness guage, luminance/reflectivity test records.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Correct colour, spacing, aligned with edges/centrelines.
METHOD: install with approved adhesive per manufacturer; must not be dislodged with hand pressure.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: RRPM placement log with spacings and colour coding noted.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD: Joint inspections with superintendent
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Works complete, complient, free from defects, overspray or misaligned markings.
METHOD: Walkhrough audit with reference to drawings and spec. punch list created and rectifies if needed.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Final sign off form, defect rectification log if neededn
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
